Description: Body and tondo sherd of Attic black-figured pottery Siana cup; interior: from outside, glazed area and friezes separated by triple lines: backward 'z' pattern; outlined tongues, alternately added red and black; triple net band; at inner break, tips of possible maeander pattern; exterior: glazed black with reserved band with three lines on it at centre of sherd.
Curator's comments: For the decorative bands see Brijder, H. A. G., Siana Cups II. Amsterdam 1991, 574, fig. 119, 576, fig. 120a, 578 and pl. 174a.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0383) (Phase 1)
